name: asetsMatlabMaxFlow
tagline: Matlab implementations of continuous max flow variants
body:
## Welcome to the Advanced Segmentation Tools (ASeTs) repository
We are currently updating our repositories, please stay tuned! 

***

## Available Max Flow Optimizers
***
### Binary Continuous Max Flow Optimization

***
### Potts Model (Multi-region) Optimization
```
@incollection{yuan2010continuous,
  title={A continuous max-flow approach to potts model},
  author={Yuan, Jing and Bae, Egil and Tai, Xue-Cheng and Boykov, Yuri},
  booktitle={Computer Vision--ECCV 2010},
  pages={379--392},
  year={2010},
  publisher={Springer Berlin Heidelberg}
}
```

```
@article{baxter2014continuous,
  title={A Continuous Max-Flow Approach to General Hierarchical Multi-Labelling Problems},
  author={Baxter, John SH and Rajchl, Martin and Yuan, Jing and Peters, Terry M},
  journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:1404.0336},
  year={2014}
}
```
***
### Ishikawa Model (Multi-region) Optimization

References:  
```
@inproceedings{rajchl2012fast,
  title={Fast Interactive Multi-region Cardiac Segmentation With Linearly Ordered Labels},
  author={Rajchl, M and Yuan, J and Ukwatta, E and Peters, TM},
  booktitle={Biomedical Imaging (ISBI), 2012 9th IEEE International Symposium on},
  pages={1409--1412},
  year={2012},
  organization={IEEE Conference Publications}
}
```
***
### Hierarchical Max Flow (HMF) Optimization
References:  
```
@article{baxter2014continuous,
  title={A Continuous Max-Flow Approach to General Hierarchical Multi-Labelling Problems},
  author={Baxter, John SH and Rajchl, Martin and Yuan, Jing and Peters, Terry M},
  journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:1404.0336},
  year={2014}
}
```

```
@article{rajchl2014interactive,
  title={Interactive Hierarchical Max-Flow Segmentation of Scar Tissue from Late-Enhancement Cardiac MR Images},
  author={Rajchl, M. and Yuan, J. and White, J. and Ukwatta, E. and Stirrat, J. and Nambakhsh, C. and Li, F. and Peters, T.},
  journal={IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging},
  volume={33},
  number={1},
  pages={159--172},
  year={2014},
  publisher={IEEE}
}
```

***
### Max Flow propagated Multi-phase Levelsets

References (bibtex):
```
@incollection{rajchl2015variational,
  title={Variational Time-Implicit Multiphase Level-Sets},
  author={Rajchl, Martin and Baxter, John SH and Bae, Egil and Tai, Xue-Cheng and Fenster, Aaron and Peters, Terry M and Yuan, Jing},
  booktitle={Energy Minimization Methods in Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition},
  pages={278--291},
  year={2015},
  publisher={Springer International Publishing}
}
```

***

John S.H. Baxter (@jshbaxter), Robarts Research Insitute (CAN)
